<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> kMaxWidth = 128u;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Prefix = (Style == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0aff4b514f126214ab6ab5ab9ecd249cd6">HexPrintStyle::PrefixLower</a> ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">                 Style == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a3cc854288a88eeb0ef88c4fc91ee69c6">HexPrintStyle::PrefixUpper</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a19de5b94f7b83900d4b296d9fa491aec">Upper</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">      (Style == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a19de5b94f7b83900d4b296d9fa491aec">HexPrintStyle::Upper</a> || Style == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a3cc854288a88eeb0ef88c4fc91ee69c6">HexPrintStyle::PrefixUpper</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrefixChars = Prefix ? 2 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumChars =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::max(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(W), std::max(1u, Nibbles) + PrefixChars);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  ::memset(NumberBuffer, </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;0&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, std::size(NumberBuffer));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Prefix)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumberBuffer&#91;1&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;x&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;EndPtr = NumberBuffer + NumChars;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CurPtr = EndPtr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> x = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) % 16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;--CurPtr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7e4ad7349e8727c7d296afe9db1a09a2">hexdigit</a>(x, !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a19de5b94f7b83900d4b296d9fa491aec">Upper</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> /= 16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a6e0cbc5c8568d8446c284c8538b2c9f1">write</a>(NumberBuffer, NumChars);</Highlight></CodeLine>
